COMMON.ERROR_LOGGING_IN: An error occurred trying to log in into PlanetRadio
COMMON.ERROR_LOGGING_OUT: An error occurred trying to log out from PlanetRadio

BAUERRADIO.ACCOUNT_LOGIN_DESC: Login in to your free PlanetRadio account can give you additional features. There are also some ad-break free premium subscription channels available.
BAUERRADIO.D_DEBUGSETTINGS: Configure debug level for the plugin
BAUERRADIO.D_ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGGING: 0: no debug info, higher numbers give more detailed debug info
